 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂחָה‎</span>] **verb** ==swim== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָחוּ‎</span> ***swimming***; Targum <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְחָא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***swim, bathe***, also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָחְיָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַחְיָנָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂחְיָנָא‎</span> ***swimmer***; Aph\`el ***wash***); — 

**Qal** ***Participle*** + ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּאֲשֶׁר יְפָרֵשׂ הַשּׂחֶה לִשְׂחוֺת‎</span> [[Isa.25.11|Isa 25:11]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַשְׂחֶה‎</span> [[Ps.6.7|Ps 6:7]] ***I make*** my bed ***swim*** (with my tears; another view below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂיחַ‎</span>**Qal 1**).
